common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to bind first mile tracking number.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Dropoff FM tracking code must be between 6 to 40 characters

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: FM code cannot be empty.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Format wrong. FM tracking number only contains character and number.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Pickup FM tracking code must start with "CNF" or "KRF" + 18 numbers

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Self Deliver FM tracking code must start with \"CNF\" or \"KRF\" + 18 numbers

error_list.name: firstmile.business_error
error_list.description: There is common business error

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: One FM code cannot be predeclared with different shipping methods

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN does not belong to FM enabled TWS.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN is tied to another FM code

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The FM code does not exist

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error (TWS fail), please contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The logistics status is not supported for binding

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN does not exist

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The SLS TN is not a CB TN

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The FM status is incorrect.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error, please try again later/ contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: You used a Delivered FM code, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: Your predeclared order creation time is later than pick up time, please use a new FM code.

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: The shipping method and logistics id are not matched

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: System error, please contact Shopee

error_list.name: firstmile.error
error_list.description: FM Code WHSID can only bind SLS TN with the same WHSID

error_list.name: error_not_found
error_list.description: Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: firstmile.area_not_support
error_list.description: Area is invalid.Now we only support area in {area}.

error_list.name: firstmile.batch_api_all_failed
error_list.description: Failed, please check result_list for more details.

error_list.name: firstmile.system_error
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: firstmile.param_duplication
error_list.description: Duplicate order_sn {order_sn} or package_number: {package_number}.

error_list.name: firstmile.invalid_order_status
error_list.description: The status of order(order_sn: {order_sn}) is invalid. Please check the order status.

error_list.name: firstmile.invalid_package
error_list.description: Package is not exist.

error_list.name: firstmile.order_has_been_split
error_list.description: The order(order_sn: {order_sn}) has been split

error_list.name: firstmile.order_not_exist
error_list.description: Order is not exist.

error_list.name: firstmile.package_has_bind
error_list.description: Package (order_sn: {order_sn}, package_number: {package_number}) has been bind to first mile code.

error_list.name: firstmile.shipment_auth
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for the first mile shipment method: {method}.

error_list.name: firstmile.shipment_pre_declare_permission
error_list.description: The shop has no permission for first mile pre declare.

error_list.name: firstmile.wrong_shipment_method
error_list.description: Shipment method is invalid. Please check the shipment method.

params:
{"request_params":[{"name":"first_mile_tracking_number","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"CNF731738838434210105","type":"string","description":"

If using \"pickup\" or \"self_deliver\" as the shipment method the \"first_mile_tracking_number\" field should pass the value generated from v2.first_mile.generate_first_mile_tracking_number.


If using \"dropoff\" as the shipment method the \"first_mile_tracking_number\" field should pass the tracking number provide by the supplier.

","key":"GXtyekF"},{"name":"shipment_method","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"pickup","type":"string","description":"

The shipment method for bound orders, should be pickup, dropoff or self_deliver.

","key":"rxhJihn"},{"name":"region","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"cn","type":"string","description":"

Use this field to specify the region you want to ship parcel.

Available value: cn,kr. 

Please fill in the field according to the region of the Merchant to which the shop belongs.

","key":"KxSsaYM"},{"name":"logistics_channel_id","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"813","type":"int32","description":"

The identity of first-mile logistic channel.

If you using \"dropoff\" or \"pickup\" as shipment method, please call v2.first_mile.get_channel_list to get the logsitc_channel_id then fill it.


If you using \"self_deliver\"as shipment method then the logistics_channel_id should be \"null\".

","key":"BerAthe"},{"name":"volume","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"1.0","type":"float","description":"The volume of the parcel.","key":"sWrQbmr"},{"name":"weight","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"2.0","type":"float","description":"The weight of the parcel.","key":"tFdMZjf"},{"name":"width","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"3.0","type":"float","description":"The width of the parcel.","key":"RhxEYHB"},{"name":"length","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"4.0","type":"float","description":"The length of the parcel.","key":"yKSAMwj"},{"name":"height","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"5.0","type":"float","description":"The height of the parcel.","key":"sSJNAWi"},{"name":"order_list","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"","type":"object[]","children":[{"name":"order_sn","limits":"","required":"True","sample":"201229TVRKVB8W","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"TzDHpyz"},{"name":"package_number","limits":"","required":"False","sample":"","type":"string","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.","key":"tYzXZcP"}],"description":"The set of ordersn. You can specify up to 50 ordersns in this call.one fm_tn maximum number of total bind orders is 10000.","key":"SYcWKSy"}],"response_params":[{"sample":"uyavvIOqyJUSgWCNaXkCSHigqrFgHpuJ","type":"string","name":"request_id","description":"The identifier for an API request for error tracking.","key":"sicCbKA"},{"sample":"firstmile.batch_api_all_failed","type":"string","name":"error","description":"Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"GeFYdBT"},{"sample":"All failed, please check result_list for detail","type":"string","name":"message","description":"Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.","key":"CcXYjdr"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"Indicate warning message you should take care.","name":"warning","children":[{"sample":"201229TVRKVB8W","type":"string","name":"order_sn","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"MxDFZee"}],"key":"NPmRWrS"},{"sample":"","type":"object","description":"Detail informations you are querying.","name":"response","children":[{"sample":"CNF731738838434210105","type":"string","name":"first_mile_tracking_number","description":"The first mile tracking number","key":"bdnKtaH"},{"sample":"","type":"object[]","description":"The list of orders.","name":"order_list","children":[{"sample":"201229TVRKVB80","type":"string","name":"order_sn","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for an order.","key":"JSGXedH"},{"sample":"","type":"string","name":"package_number","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.","key":"JPZkCPx"},{"sample":"firstmile.order_not_exist","type":"string","name":"fail_error","description":"Indicate error type if one element hit error.","key":"WSQPPFZ"},{"sample":"Order is not exist.","type":"string","name":"fail_message","description":"Indicate error details if one element hit error.","key":"iPEBcsw"}],"key":"teQRNYY"}],"key":"jCKSmtp"}]}

update_log_list.content: update the description of the request field "region"

update first_mile_tracking_number field description
If using self_deliver, you must also pass the first_mile_tracking_number value generated from v2.first_mile.generate_first_mile_tracking_number.
